channel.title: Pi Configuration :: Zymbit Workshop
channel.description: Now it’s time to plug the Pi in to the power supply, wait for it to boot, and get started setting up our security! First, let’s login to your Pi. Remember the hostname you gave it back while you were Configuring your SD Card? You’ll need that, and the username/password that you set. You will also need a terminal application. Important On macOS, you can go to Applications –> Utilities –> Terminal.
